text:
Can you hear the Ice cream van,
The Ice cream van, the Ice cream van,

Can you hear the Ice cream van,
And Vicky is her name.

Would you like an ice cream cone,
Ice cream cone, ice cream cone,

Would you like an ice cream cone,
That Vicky has just made.

Vicky drives through the town,
Through the town, through the town,

Vicky drives through the town
To serve some more ice cream!

Would you like some chocolate sauce,
Some chocolate sauce, Some chocolate sauce,

Would you like some chocolate sauce,
Or would you like it plain?

Vicky drives to the beach,
To the beach, to the beach,
Vicky drives to the beach.
It’s very very hot!

This ice cream will cool you down,
Will cool you down, will cool you down

This ice cream will cool you down,
Just watch it doesn’t melt!
Would you like a flake with that?
A flake with that?
A Flake with that?
Would you like a flake with that?
And Sprinkles on top!

Would you like an ice lolly,
An ice lolly, an ice lolly,

Would you like an ice lolly,
And perhaps some lemonade.

Did you hear the Ice cream van,
The Ice cream van, the Ice cream van,

Did you hear the Ice cream van,
And Vicky is her name.
